front.title: MPLS-TP Traffic Engineering (TE) Management Information Base (MIB)

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes additional managed objects and textual conventions for Tunnels, Identifiers and Label Switching Router to support Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) MIB modules for transport networks.
